postOp.description: Structured recovery programs after knee/hip replacement, ACL surgery, and other procedures.

manual.title: Manual Therapy & Spinal Manipulation
manual.description: Hands-on treatment techniques including spinal manipulation, joint mobilization, and soft tissue work.

cupping.title: Cupping & Acupressure Therapy
cupping.description: Traditional healing methods including cupping, acupressure, and Sujok therapy for pain relief.

drSubodh.name: Dr. Subodh Kumar
drSubodh.description: With extensive training in alternative medicine and neurotherapy, Dr. Kumar specializes in treating chronic pain conditions using acupuncture, acupressure, and Sujok therapy.

drTiwari.name: Dr. J.K. Tiwari
drTiwari.description: Dr. Tiwari brings years of expertise in physiotherapy and manual therapy, with specialized certifications in Neurodevelopmental Treatment (NDT) and Manual Therapy.
